attributes.action: MPs duty bound / forced to reveal they rent Tax Payer funded homes.
attributes.additional_details:
Members of the House of Commons, current and former ministers, who claim expenses for Rent when already receiving rent from properties that they own in London, or have purchased, improved, furnished with taxpayer assistance.
Must be stopped, exposed, and rules changed that prevents, does not allow this to happen.

If they own a property in London they should use it for their parliamentary office and not claim tax payers money, expenses for another home.

This is happening now and has been for years. The loopholes that allow this must be Closed.

Where property portfolios can be built up at Tax Payers expense and must be stopped.
